viral_hooks.pattern: Here's a trick that will cut {Time Period} out of your {Activity}
viral_hooks.example: Here's a trick that will cut 5hrs out of your content creation every month.

viral_hooks.pattern: Let me show you one of the easiest {Niche | Topic | Industry} strategies if you're {Career | Audience}
viral_hooks.example: Let me show you one of the easiest sales strategies if you're an Email Marketer.

viral_hooks.pattern: Get rid of {Undesirable Outcome} in {Time Period}
viral_hooks.example: Get rid of Writer's Block in 60 Seconds

viral_hooks.pattern: Let me give you the #1 reason why you're not getting {Outcome}. It's not {Reason 1}, It's not {Reason 2}. It's actually {Reason 3}. Here's how to {What are you going to teach?}
viral_hooks.example: Let me give you the #1 reason why you're not getting new followers. It's not the lack of posts. It's not bad design. It's actually boring content. Here's how to get ideas for engaging content in just 10 minutes.
viral_hooks.use_case: Debunking myths and revealing root causes

viral_hooks.pattern: These are the {Number} ways to make money with {What?|Platform|Tool|Idea}
viral_hooks.example: These are the 3 ways to make money with Instagram.

viral_hooks.pattern: No one told you about this simple trick to {Outcome}
viral_hooks.example: No one told you about this simple trick to gain your first 10K followers on Instagram.
Secrets to write like a best-selling author

viral_hooks.pattern: {Number} {Career | Authorities} say you must never do this
viral_hooks.example: 7 top marketers say you must never do this.
viral_hooks.use_case: Expert warnings and mistakes to avoid

viral_hooks.example: 5 little known ways to get more views on your reels

viral_hooks.pattern: Did you know it's easier to {Action} than {Action 2}? I know it sounds crazy. So here's the deal.
viral_hooks.example: Did you know it's easier to grow without ads than with ads on Instagram? I know it sounds crazy. So here's the deal.

viral_hooks.pattern: {Number} {Career | Authorities} say you must do this to {Outcome}
viral_hooks.example: 10 top content creators say you must do this to get more followers.

viral_hooks.pattern: {Common Action or Advice} is wrong. Before you yell at me, hear me out.
viral_hooks.example: Paying your home debt is wrong. Before you yell at me, hear me out.

viral_hooks.pattern: Here's another way how {Authority} avoids {Undesired Activity}. And you don't have to be {Adjective} to use the same strategies.
viral_hooks.example: Here's another way how rich people avoid paying taxes. And you don't have to be rich to use the same strategies.

viral_hooks.pattern: A tiny {Curiosity Word} that changed my {What Changed?}
viral_hooks.example: A tiny secret that changed my life

viral_hooks.pattern: {Number} steps to start|grow a {Adjective} {Topic | Product | Tool | Idea} in just {Time Period}
viral_hooks.example: 7 steps to grow a profitable Instagram account in just 30 days.
How I made $20K with three Instagram posts

viral_hooks.pattern: I gained {What did you gain?} in {Time Period} without {Pain Point}. Here are {Number} secrets to growing an audience.
viral_hooks.example: I gained 100K followers in 12 months without spending on ads. Here are 7 secrets to growing an audience

viral_hooks.pattern: If I had to start {What are you starting?} from zero, here's what I would do to {Desired Outcome} in less than {Period Of Time}.
viral_hooks.example: If I had to start an Instagram account from zero, here's what I would do to crack the first 10K followers in less than 3 months.
